name: Raindrop (Extrone)
description:
It was a nice and happy day until the Tree Fell.

Find your way back home in this spooky adventure game and eliminate darkness from the world.

⚠ Epilepsy Warning - Game contains Flashing Lights. You can adjust the brightness of the flash in the Settings ⚠

Controls

Movement - W/A/S/D

Launch - Space Bar

Tips - T

Pause - Esc/P
